refnamediv.refpurpose: log viewer for the systemd journal

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: gnome-logs shows events from the systemd journal, and sorts them into categories, such as hardware and applications. Using gnome-logs you can search your logs by typing a search term, and view detailed information about each event by clicking on it.

refsect1.title: Author
refsect1.para: gnome-logs was written by David King davidk@gnome.org
This manual page was written by David King davidk@gnome.org.
